text: Charlie Ondras was a drummer from New York and a founding member of the noise rock band Unsane, formerly Lawn-Chair-Blisters.Unsane Biography on Matador Records website , cited March 31, 2011 He also collaborated with Jon Spencer and Cristina Martinez under the name Boss Hog and appeared on the band's first two releases. Ondras died of a heroin overdose while attending the 1992 New Music Seminar in New York.Jones, Brad. "Unsane in the Brain". Unsane Biography.
